title: Placid Chang’an - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Clever Protagonist   Mystery Solving   Older Love Interests   Politics   Royalty
author: 盐盐 Yany
description:
A story of a new Imperial Court official, Su Cen who has just passed Imperial exams and catches the eye of Prince Regent - Li Shi.

Crime solving story with plenty of political strife, separation and reunion and truth prevailing even in the dark. >
